duties_responsibilities.duty: Expertise in SAP Logistics execution and 3PL integration
Hands-on experience in order management, shipping, receiving, and supply chain processes
Understanding of ABAP code and basic level debugging
Work in CST time zone and co-ordinate with offshore resources
Deliver artifacts and have a basic-advanced level understanding of SDLC.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field
